properties.entry: SELECT sps.id AS VALUE , sps.NAME AS SHIP_METHOD_LEVEL, spv.code AS CARRIER_CODE FROM sc_postage_services sps , sc_postage_vendor spv WHERE 1=1 {@ and sps.id = #postageServiceId#}
SELECT sps.id AS value , CONCAT(spv.name ,':' , sps.name ) AS text FROM sc_postage_services sps , sc_postage_vendor spv WHERE sps.vendor_id = spv.id
INSERT INTO sc_postage_vendor ( CODE, NAME, SOFTWARE_ID, MEMO ) VALUES ( '{@#code#}', '{@#name#}', {@#softwareId:0#}, '{@#memo#}' )
UPDATE sc_postage_vendor SET CODE = '{@#code#}' , NAME = '{@#name#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' , SOFTWARE_ID = {@#softwareId:0#} WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'

INSERT INTO sc_postage_services ( NAME, TAG, COUNTRY, CODE, VENDOR_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MEMO ) VALUES ( '{@#name#}', '{@#tag#}', '{@#country#}', '{@#code#}', '{@#vendorId#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#memo#}' )
UPDATE sc_postage_services SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , TAG = '{@#tag#}' , COUNTRY = '{@#country#}' , CODE = '{@#code#}' , VENDOR_ID = '{@#vendorId#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
